RelatedSentence: ADDIS ABABA , Ethiopia , May 19 , 2014 / African Press Organization ( APO ) / - The Chairperson of the Commission of the African Union ( AU ) , Dr Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma , strongly condemns the violent incidents that took place in Kidal on 16 and 17 May 2014 , during the visit of the Prime Minister of the Republic of Mali , Mr. Moussa Mara , in that part of the Malian territory .
She deplores the losses of human lives that resulted from those incidents .
The Chairperson of the Commission also condemns the current occupation of the governorate of the city by armed elements holding officials as hostages .
